casebody.data:
Second Department,

October, 1959

(October 5, 1959) Michael P. Grace, II, Individually and as a Trustee under the Will of Janet Grace, Appellant, v. Deepdale, Inc., et al., Defendants and Real Property Owners, Inc., Respondent. Corinne Grace, as Guardian ad Litem for Michael P. Grace, Jr., an Infant, Plaintiff, v. Joseph P. Grace, Jr., et al., as Trustees under the Will of Janet Grace, Deceased, et al., Respondents.

Motions for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Present — Wenzel, Acting P. J., Beldock, Murphy, Hallinan and Kleinfeld, JJ.
